code: import axios from'axios';export const setLoadingInterceptor=_ref=>{let{showLoading,hideLoading}=_ref;axios.interceptors.request.use(req=>{if(!(req.data instanceof FormData))showLoading();return req;},error=>{hideLoading();return Promise.reject(error);});axios.interceptors.response.use(res=>{hideLoading();return res;},error=>{hideLoading();return Promise.reject(error);});};export default setLoadingInterceptor;
